{"id":665826091,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1648053554,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/665826091/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        int l=s.length();\n        int left=0,right=l-1;\n        transform(s.begin(),s.end(),s.begin(),::tolower);\n        while(left<right)\n        {\n            while(!isalnum(s[left]) && left<right)\n                left++;\n            while(!isalnum(s[right]) && left<right)\n                right--;\n            if(s[left++]!=s[right--])\n                return false;\n          \n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
